Store at   and warm to   before use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":96,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6tg44","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2448E930F1B711EC9CADC9F9AFF52F4F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2736BA50F1B711EC9CADC9F9AFF52F4F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9cg4t","text":"High-throughput, predictable systems that are easily modulated are ideal for the study of cell biology. Here we developed a protocol to investigate the role of the Nuclear Factor kappa-B Effector Molecule (NEMO) in Parkin-dependent mitochondrial clearance. Transient transfection of fluorescent constructs allowed us to visualize subcellular structures and dynamics while maintaining flexibility in a consistent model system. The EGFP-NEMO plasmid was repeatedly employed to study NEMO interactions during mitophagy, and we were also able to edit the construct to create both a NEMO point mutation and a Halo-tagged NEMO construct, which we readily expressed in HeLa cells. Halo-fusion constructs, including NEMO and OPTN used in our study, allowed us to visualize the exogenously expressed proteins conjugated to chemical ligands in a variety of colors. This and the accompanying protocols were critical to our characterization of NEMO’s involvement in mitophagy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.grant_id: Mechanisms of mitochondrial damage control by PINK1 and Parkin (ASAP-000350)

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dda06","text":"This protocol was adapted from a previous protocol for similar techniques (see dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bt7wnrpe).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24lp4","text":"In order to investigate Parkin-dependent mitophagy, we over-express Parkin, which is not endogenously expressed in HeLa cells. We employ an untagged Parkin construct, however there are many permutations of fluorescently conjugated proteins that could be used to study this process.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64rd1","text":"We use HeLa-M cells, HeLa OPTN-/- cells, and HeLa p62-/- cells in the study corresponding to this protocol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3rr7k","text":"Follow plating protocol as described in dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bt7wnrpe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Wait until they reach 80-90%.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ep7m1","text":"Add Tube 2 to Tube 1 and invert 8 times to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ek4m","text":"Incubate  -  at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"DC96F0C0F15011EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"DF9B3010F15011EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E3BFFA90F15011EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6assj","text":"Spin   in a mini centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2,"guid":"F13F2DD0F15011EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"unf3","text":"Add entire volume (~ \u003e400 uL) to the cells dropwise, distributing the drops mostly in the center of the dish (where the imaging window is).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejkhh","text":"Prepare Halo Dilution A by making a 1:200 dilution of stock Halo ligand in Culture Media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ou8q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fnvck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"drg8n","text":"Will use 20 uL Dilution A per dish","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1bu8l","text":"Can freeze Dilution A at -20 for up to several months","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"frogb","text":"Prepare working ligand solution by transferring   conditioned media from the dish where cells are plated to a 1.5 mL tube and adding   Halo Dilution A.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":133,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"280","error":false,"guid":"5D0D23F0F15111EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"6693F3E0F15111EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2d045","text":"Transfer the rest of the conditioned media in the well (~2 mL) to a 10 mL conical tube and store in a   water bath.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7BA8FC80F15111EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5if4c","text":"Gently drop Dilution A onto cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"adcuq","text":"Incubate cells at  , 5% CO2 for at least  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cc1af","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7djd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9k1nc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8B200820F15111EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"96A7FF40F15111EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"88ls1","text":"Note: this incubation step can be up to 2 hr, but a longer incubation introduces the risk of media evaporation","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8h6mq","text":"Remove the cells from the incubator and aspirate ligand solution with vacuum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvt0l","text":"Wash cells gently with ~  conditioned media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"DC8EBDF0F15111EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ksfb","text":"Aspirate wash media and repeat for a total of 2 washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jovp","text":"Add   conditioned media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"E7101A80F15111EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91fj5","text":"Replace plated cells in incubator and rest for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"FAC2D400F15111EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1243","text":"Wash cells gently with ~  conditioned media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"014ABBD0F15211EC8074D7E375588526","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4vb6n","text":"Aspirate wash media and repeat for a total of 2 washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6qp8","text":"Cells are prepared for fixation or imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
